Module imagingbook.common
Package imagingbook.common.threshold.global

Class MinMaxThresholder

java.lang.Object
imagingbook.common.threshold.global.MinMaxThresholder
All Implemented Interfaces:
GlobalThresholder, Thresholder
public class MinMaxThresholder extends Object implements GlobalThresholder

Simple global thresholder which sets the threshold centered between the image's minimum and maximum pixel value. See Sec. 9.1.2 of [1] for additional details (Eq. 9.12).

[1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, Digital Image Processing – An Algorithmic Introduction, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).

Version:
2022/08/23
